name: Scuttle
text: You know how to keep your head down and crawl away undetected by larger foes.
benefit: You can crawl at half your normal speed and can take a 5-foot step when crawling. When crawling, you donâ€™t provoke attacks of opportunity from opponents that are one or more size categories larger than you.
normal: You can crawl 5 feet as a move action, and crawling provokes attacks of opportunity.
